Name: Engine energy source
Description: Engine energy source is a fuel or battery which is used to power an engine. fuel, battery or generator. Not the source for the generator. e.g. In a Toyota Prius an energy source would NOT be regenerative braking but the traction battery in which the energy to the motor is stored, or the battery is bypassed the generator is the source of energy. (however, the energy source for the the generator is the regenerative braking).
